participant_1.name: Ella Thompson
participant_1.personality: She is an empathetic and creative individual who often feels anxious about the future.
participant_1.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Dr. Samuel Rivers
participant_2.personality: He is a dedicated and caring father who prioritizes his family, yet he feels a sense of urgency in his career.
participant_2.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.
